settings.resultLengthHelp: Number of results to show at a time when searching
settings.includedCompendiaHelp: List of compendia separated by comma (RegEx accepted)
settings.addNameHelp: Do you want the current name of the item hardcoded into the link? This makes it easier to read when in edit mode but it won't dynamically update in the future.

keys.NOTE:: These should generally be the 1st letter of the titles
